comment: The logarithm of ` 1 ` to an arbitrary base ` B ` is 0. Property 1(b) of [Cohen4] p. 361. See ~ log1 . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 19-Sep-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Sep-2017.)
